name: Halo CE+
summary: Halo CE+ is a 20th anniversary project by VKMT that encompasses all 3 main versions of Halo Combat Evolved: MCC, Custom Edition, and even Original Xbox. 4 brand new MP maps are included featuring new weapons, content, and even restored cut content from Halo 1's development. MCC users will also get 2 additional party maps. Users will also be able to download the tags and content used to build the mod and create their own maps.
